name: Film Coin
description: "Today, the film, television and digital entertainment industries are filled with multiple opportunities to integrate blockchain, distributed ledger cryptocurrency technology and smart contracts. FILMCOIN is an ERC 20 Utility Token built on the secure Ethereum Network. The FILMCOIN has been designed and a pathway created to establish long-term use in everyday life, we believe that everyone operating within the Film and Television industry worldwide should have the opportunity to benefit from cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. We will create Film & Television productions that will be seen by millions and offer our communities events and experiences never seen before, a robust first of a kind NFT and e-commerce ecosystem underpinned by secure blockchain technologies, FILMCOIN is the industries cryptocurrency of choice and we believe, it will hold that position for many years to come, we will continually encourage worldwide Film and Television fans to engage in FILMCOIN and be a part of one of the fasted growing crypto communities worldwide."
